chapter.text: Nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgi xudro ʙa poki jod kun, cunon ki loiqi ʙuzurgii Ust
on Zote, ki ofarid maxluqotro va ustuvor dost
Va on Zote, ki andoza mu'ajjan kard. Sipas hama xalqro ʙa on ci munosiʙ mesavand, roh namud
Va on Zote, ki carogohhoro rujonid
Mo Qur'onro ʙaroi tu ej Rasul xohem xond va tu digar onro faromus naxohi kard
ƣajri on ci Alloh ʙixohad, hamono U oskoru pinhonro medonad
Va dar kori tu va dar hamai umuri dini va dunjavie, ki ʙa tu ru menamojad, osoni padid meovarem
Ej Rasul, agar ʙa qavmat pand dodanat foida kunad, pand deh. Xudro azoʙ madeh dar pand dodani saxse, ki sarkasi mekunad
Har kase, ki az Alloh metarsad, ʙa zudi pand xohad paziruft
Va ʙadʙaxttarin fard az on pand duri xohad guzid
Hamon kas, ki dar otasi ʙuzurgi cahannam daraftad
Ongoh dar on co na ʙimirad, ki rohat joʙad va na zinda mesavad, ki foida ʙinad
Ba durusti, kase ki xudro pokiza dost, nacot joft
Va rastagor sud, har ki nomi Parvardigori xudro ʙar zaʙon ovard va ʙaroi rizogii U namoz guzorid
Balki, sumo ej mardum, zindagii in cahonro az ne'mathoi oxirat afzal mesumored
Hol on ki oxirat ʙehtaru pojandatar ast
Begumon, in suxanho dar kitoʙhoi pesina niz hast
